de:
"Junge Leute haben heute die Sache hier unter der Überschrift âHaltung zeigenâ organisiert. Das âHaltung zeigenâ ist bezogen auf Demokratie und sozialen Zusammenhalt. Dafür stehe ich - und deshalb bin ich heute hier.

Für die Stadt Dresden haben sich junge Leute, die zum dem Thema schon immer unterwegs sind, angestrengt und haben gesagt, dass man diesen Montagsdemos und âSpaziergängenâ etwas entgegensetzen muss. en:
''Young people have organized the event today under the motto, ''Take a Stance''. The ''stance'' is related to democracy and social cohesion and I stand for that, and that is why I am here today.

These young people, who have long been involved with the subject made an effort and in the name of the city of Dresden said, ''We have to oppose these Monday demos and these 'walks' , and so that's what we are doing here and today. 

Although it is very difficult: only twenty people are allowed to stand together. It's a kind of counter-demo - it's a coming and going it doesn't look like many people - nevertheless it says something. 

When I look at it, I feel a bit sad because you expect a bit more resistance, but we and everyone else have to obey the law and that's what we do. But decisions being made so that the demonstration laws will allow a few more people, so we will have a few more opportunities within the coming weeks!''
